name: XENOLINGO
description:
XENOLINGO is a retro style puzzle game where player has to understand the meaning of the signs and complete the levels. (also a surprise twist)

Themes:
=> Makes Total Sense
=> It's not supposed to do that

Controls :
=> Left mouse click to toggle
=> Right mouse click to check.

Hints : 
=> Refer the video walkthrough if you are stuck on a level. (Will be added soon)
